FuncDef:
The advertise route-reoriginate evpn disable command disables the re-generation capability of EVPN routes for the specified VPN instance.
The undo advertise route-reoriginate evpn disable command restores the default configuration.
By default, the system is not configured to disable the re-generation of EVPN routes for the specified VPN instance.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view
BGP-VPN instance IPv6 address family view
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
IP prefix routes and IRB routes received by the device can be advertised to neighboring devices after being regenerated. By configuring advertise route-reoriginate evpn disable, you can disable route regeneration based on the VPN instance.
